name: Single filer at high income
description: Standard case for single person earning €100,000 in the Netherlands 2026

sources.description: Calculated using official 2026 Dutch tax rates. Tax: 35.75% × €38,883 + 37.56% × €39,543 + 49.50% × €21,574 = €39,432. General credit: €0 (fully phased out above €78,426). Labour credit: €5,685 - 6.510% × (€100,000 - €45,592) = €2,143. Tax after credits: €37,289.
